issue.title: [R] [CI] Fail the build if there is a documentation mismatch?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15616](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15616). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We want to make sure that we are documentating as we go. One possible solution is to add a CI job that fails the build if rogygenize() writes anything new out (h/t Neal)
